member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.Account.AccountData.SetupAccount(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Setup of all required BitSkins account data.
member.param: API Key you can retrieve through the BitSkins settings page after you enable API access for your BitSkins account.
Your two-factor secret shown when you enable Secure Access to your BitSkins account.

member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.Account.AccountData.SetupAccount(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Setup of all required BitSkins account data. Default requests per second is 8.
member.param: API Key you can retrieve through the BitSkins settings page after you enable API access for your BitSkins account.
Your two-factor secret shown when you enable Secure Access to your BitSkins account.

member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.Account.AccountData.GetTwoFactorCode
member.summary: Get two factor code for test is correct.

member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.Balance.CurrentBalance.GetAccountBalance
member.summary: Allows you to retrieve your available balance.

member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.Balance.MoneyEvents.GetMoneyEvents(System.Int32)
member.summary: Allows you to retrieve historical events that caused changes in your BitSkins balance. Upto 30 items per page.

member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.Balance.MoneyWithdraw.WithdrawMoney(System.Double,BitSkinsApi.Balance.MoneyWithdraw.WithdrawalMoneyMethod)
member.summary: Allows you to request withdrawal of available balance on your BitSkins account. All withdrawals are finalized 15 days after this request on a rolling basis.
member.param: Amount in USD to withdraw. Must be at most equal to available balance, and over $5.00 USD.
Can be bitcoin, paypal, and so on.

member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.BuyOrder.CancelingBuyOrders.CancelBuyOrders(BitSkinsApi.Market.AppId.AppName,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Allows you to cancel upto 999 active buy orders.

member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.BuyOrder.CancelingBuyOrders.CancelAllBuyOrders(BitSkinsApi.Market.AppId.AppName,System.String)
member.summary: Allows you to cancel all buy orders for a given item name.

member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.BuyOrder.CreatingBuyOrder.CreateBuyOrder(BitSkinsApi.Market.AppId.AppName,System.String,System.Double,System.Int32)
member.summary: Allows you to create a buy order for a single item. Buy orders are executed within 30 seconds if someone lists an item for sale that is at or below your buy order price. Funds are not withheld because of pending buy orders, but will be automatically cancelled if your account has insufficient funds to execute a buy order when an eligible item is up for sale.
member.param: The name of the item you want to purchase.
The price at which you want to purchase the item.
Number of buy orders to create at this price for this item.

member.name: T:BitSkinsApi.BuyOrder.PlaceInQueue
member.summary: Work with expected place in queue.

member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.BuyOrder.PlaceInQueue.GetExpectedPlaceInQueue(BitSkinsApi.Market.AppId.AppName,System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Allows you to retrieve the expected place in queue for a new buy order without creating the buy order.
member.param: The name of the item you want to purchase.
The price at which you want to purchase the item.

member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.BuyOrder.MarketBuyOrders.GetMarketBuyOrders(BitSkinsApi.Market.AppId.AppName,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Allows you to retrieve all market orders by all buyers (except your own) that need fulfillment.
member.param: The item name for which you seek buy orders.

member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.BuyOrder.MyBuyOrders.GetMyBuyOrders(BitSkinsApi.Market.AppId.AppName,System.String,BitSkinsApi.BuyOrder.MyBuyOrders.BuyOrderType,System.Int32)
member.summary: Allows you to retrieve all buy orders you have placed, whether active or not.

member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.BuyOrder.SummationBuyOrders.SummarizeBuyOrders(BitSkinsApi.Market.AppId.AppName)
member.summary: Allows you to retrieve a summary of all market buy orders. Results include your own buy orders, where applicable.
member.returns: List of items of buy order.

member.name: T:BitSkinsApi.Crypto.AccountBitcoinDepositAddress
member.summary: Work with account's Bitcoin deposit address.

member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.Crypto.AccountBitcoinDepositAddress.GetBitcoinDepositAddress
member.summary: Allows you to retrieve your account's permanent Bitcoin deposit address. Any funds sent to this address are credited to BitSkins at the current conversion rate. Conversion rates are locked in when the Bitcoin network broadcasts your transaction.

member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.Crypto.BitcoinExchangeRate.GetBitcoinDepositRate
member.summary: Allows you to retrieve the current exchange rate per Bitcoin (in USD), and the time this conversion rate will expire.
member.returns: Bitcoin deposit rate and the time this rate will expire.

member.name: T:BitSkinsApi.Crypto.BitcoinDepositRate
member.summary: Current conversion rate per Bitcoin (in USD), and the time this conversion rate will expire.

member.name: T:BitSkinsApi.Crypto.CreatingBitcoinDeposit
member.summary: Creating a payment request for Bitcoin.

member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.Crypto.CreatingBitcoinDeposit.CreateBitcoinDeposit(System.Double)
member.summary: Allows you to generate a payment request for Bitcoin. You can deposit any amount of Bitcoin (more than 0.0002 BTC).

member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.Inventory.Inventories.GetAccountInventory(BitSkinsApi.Market.AppId.AppName,System.Int32)
member.summary: Allows you to retrieve your account's available inventory on Steam (items listable for sale), your BitSkins inventory (items currently on sale), and your pending withdrawal inventory (items you delisted or purchased).

member.summary: User's pending withdrawal from BitSkins inventory.

member.summary: Allows you to delist an active sale item and/or re-attempt an item pending withdrawal.

member.summary: Work with App name and Id.

member.summary: Allows you to delist an active sale item.

member.summary: Allows you to retrieve your history of sold items on BitSkins. Defaults to 30 items per page, with most recent appearing first.

member.summary: Work with your items history on BitSkins.

member.summary: Allows you to retrieve bought/sold/listed item history.

member.name: T:BitSkinsApi.Market.InventoryOnSale
member.summary: Work with BitSkins inventory on sale.
Allows you to retrieve the BitSkins inventory currently on sale. This includes items you cannot buy (i.e., items listed for sale by you).
member.param: Results per page. Must be either 30, or 480.

member.name: T:BitSkinsApi.Market.SpecificItemsOnSale
member.summary: Work with specific items on sale.

member.summary: Allows you to retrieve data for specific Item IDs that are currently on sale.
member.param: List of item ids. Upto 250 item IDs.
member.returns: Specific items on sale on BitSkins.

member.name: T:BitSkinsApi.Market.ItemOnSale
member.summary: Item on sale in BitSkins inventory.

member.name: T:BitSkinsApi.Market.SpecificItems
member.summary: Specific items on sale on BitSkins.

member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.Market.MarketData.GetMarketData(BitSkinsApi.Market.AppId.AppName)
member.summary: Allows you to retrieve basic price data for items currently on sale at BitSkins.
member.returns: List of items currently on sale at BitSkins.

member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.Market.ModifySaleItems.ModifySale(BitSkinsApi.Market.AppId.AppName,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Double})
member.summary: Allows you to change the price on an item currently on sale.
member.param: New item prices, in order of item_ids.

member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.Market.PriceDatabase.GetAllItemPrices(BitSkinsApi.Market.AppId.AppName)
member.summary: Allows you to retrieve the entire price database used at BitSkins.

member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.Market.Purchase.BuyItem(BitSkinsApi.Market.AppId.AppName,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Double},System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Allows you to buy the item currently on sale on BitSkins. Item must not be currently be on sale to you.
member.param: Prices at which you want to make the purchase. Important to specify this in case the prices change by the time you make this call.
Initiate trade offer for purchased items' delivery.
Use 'true' if you want to purchase items that are trade-delayed.

member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.Market.RecentSaleInfo.GetRecentSaleInfo(BitSkinsApi.Market.AppId.AppName,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Allows you to retrieve upto 5 pages worth of recent sale data for a given item name. These are the recent sales for the given item at BitSkins, in descending order.

member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.Market.RelistForSale.RelistItem(BitSkinsApi.Market.AppId.AppName,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Double})
member.summary: Allows you to re-list a delisted/purchased item for sale. Re-listed items can be sold instantly, where applicable.

member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.Market.ResetPriceItems.GetResetPriceItems(BitSkinsApi.Market.AppId.AppName,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a paginated list of items that need their prices reset. Items need prices reset when Steam changes tracker so BitSkins are unable to match specified prices to the received items when you list them for sale. Upto 30 items per page. Items that need price resets always have the reserved price of 4985.11.

member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.Market.Sale.SellItem(BitSkinsApi.Market.AppId.AppName,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Double})
member.summary: Allows you to list an item for sale. This item comes from your Steam inventory. If successful, bots will ask you to trade in the item you want listed for sale.
member.param: List of item IDs from your Steam inventory.
List of prices for each item ID you want to list for sale.

member.name: T:BitSkinsApi.Market.InformationAboutSellerBot
member.summary: Information about the bot that offers the trade.

member.name: T:BitSkinsApi.Market.SteamRawPriceData
member.summary: Work with raw Steam Market price data.

member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.Market.SteamRawPriceData.GetRawPriceData(BitSkinsApi.Market.AppId.AppName,System.String)
member.summary: Allows you to retrieve raw Steam Community Market price data for a given item. You can use this data to create your own pricing algorithm if you need it.
member.returns: Raw Steam Market price data for a given item.

member.name: T:BitSkinsApi.Market.ItemRawPrice
member.summary: Sales data about Steam item at a certain time.

member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.Trade.RecentOffers.GetRecentTradeOffers(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Allows you to retrieve information about 50 most recent trade offers sent by BitSkins.
member.param: Value is 'true' if you only need trade offers currently active.

member.name: M:BitSkinsApi.Trade.Details.GetTradeDetails(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Allows you to retrieve information about items requested/sent in a given trade from BitSkins. Trade details will be unretrievable 7 days after the initiation of the trade.
member.param: The trade token in the Steam trade's message.
The trade ID in the Steam trade's message.
